short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check if the extension is safe to use

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🛡️ Browser Extension Safety Check

Ensure a worry-free browsing experience with our latest creation: the Browser Extension Safety Check! 🌐✨

How to use?
1. Install It
2. Pin it
3. Open the Chrome Web Store or  Microsoft Edge Add-ons
4. Select a extension or Open extension URL:
https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/json-viewer/gbmdgpbipfallnflgajpaliibnhdgobh
https://microsoftedge.microsoft.com/addons/detail/okx-wallet/pbpjkcldjiffchgbbndmhojiacbgflha
5. Click the extension icon
6. Click the scan button

🔍 Key Features:

🕵️‍♂️ Manifest.json Analysis: Delve into the manifest.json file to identify the permissions your extension requires.

🛑 Risk Assessment: Understand the potential risks associated with the plugin by examining the permissions it requests.

🚦 Pre-Installation Insights: Receive a comprehensive overview before downloading, empowering you to make informed decisions about your browser extensions.

📋 Detailed Manifest Inspection: Uncover the intricacies of your extension's manifest file, ensuring transparency and security.


💡 How It Works:

Analyze Manifest.json: Simply input the manifest.json file of the extension you are considering.

Permission Breakdown: Receive a detailed breakdown of the permissions requested by the plugin.

Risk Evaluation: Our system evaluates the potential risks associated with each permission.

Installation Confidence: Armed with this information, decide whether to confidently install the extension or explore safer alternatives.


⚠️ Why Browser Extension Safety Check?

Security First: Prioritize your online security by understanding the permissions your extensions demand.

Risk Mitigation: Make informed choices to minimize potential risks and vulnerabilities.

🔐 Your Browsing Security Matters – Try Browser Extension Safety Check Today! 🌐🛡️
